asaṅkhataṁ.summary: (pp) unconditioned; not created; unformed; unconstructed; epithet of Nibbāna; (comm) not made [na > a + saṁ + √kar > khar + ta] pp of na saṅkharoti

tathā.summary: (ind) so; thus; in such a way; likewise; similarly [ta + thā] ind, adv, from ta
(adj) true; real; actual [tathā + a] adj, from tathā
(masc) name of a privately awakened Buddha [tathā + a] masc, from tathā

vitthāretabbaṁ.summary: (ptp) should be expanded in detail; should be filled out [vi + thāre + tabba] ptp of vitthāreti

yathā.summary: (ind) like; as; as per; according to; how; in whatever way [ya + thā] ind, adv, from ya
(ind) because; since [ya + thā] ind, adv, from ya
(ind) (gram) for example [ya + thā] ind, adv, from ya
